de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.distance

Class PrimitiveDistanceSimilarityQuery<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.distance.AbstractDistanceQuery<O>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.distance.PrimitiveDistanceQuery<O>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.distance.PrimitiveDistanceSimilarityQuery<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseQuery, DistanceQuery<O>, DistanceSimilarityQuery<O>, SimilarityQuery<O>

    public class PrimitiveDistanceSimilarityQuery<O>
extends PrimitiveDistanceQuery<O>
implements DistanceSimilarityQuery<O>
    Combination query class, for convenience.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
